title: I am a PIM customer
description: I am a customer of an Akeneo PIM project, and I want to get access to my archive, manage my clouds instance or get access to the support.

get-source-code.title: Manage the access to the PIM Enterprise archive and extensions
get-source-code.description: I start an on Premise or Flexibility project and I want to get the archive from the Enterprise Repository to install it and start to develop.

manage-flexibility-instance.title: Set up and manage the access to your Flexibility cloud instance
manage-flexibility-instance.description: I want to set up my instance and manage the access to the instance server

manage-serenity-instance.title: Set up your Serenity cloud instance
manage-serenity-instance.description: I want to set up my serenity instance.

support-access.title: Get Helpdesk access
support-access.description: Manage the access to the Akeneo Helpdesk for your team.
